name: Fantasia
descriptions: Fantasia is one of Dukov's party girls in 2277.

Similar to Cherry, Fantasia stays with Dukov for his protection. She says "Dukey" is alright, can be a nice guy, is good in bed, and he gives her caps. Fantasia says she would rather be a "whore" than dead, and she and Cherry frequently party with him. Fantasia is also into Jet to some degree.

If Dukov is killed and Cherry goes to Rivet City, Fantasia will remain in Dukov's place, wandering around and drinking. If one speaks to her, she may respond as if one had just told her of Dukov's death (even if the Lone Wanderer killed him in front of her earlier). She will explain briefly what used to go on there and why she is so scantily dressed, and express regret that Dukov is gone and the good times are over.

topics.topic_text: Who are you? And why are you dressed like that?
topics.response_text: Dukey doesn't like me to wear a lot. He says it slows things down.

topics.topic: DukovDukovSo what's the deal with Dukov?
topics.response_text: He's all right. He can be a real fun guy, but he sure knows how to wear a girl out.

topics.topic: DukovLuckyDamn! I wish I had a setup like this.
topics.topic_text: Lucky bastard. He's got a sweet setup here.
Does he pay you for this?
topics.response_text: He gives me some caps, but it's not what you think. He can be a nice guy.

topics.topic_text: So... What exactly is this place?
topics.response_text: It's...well, it's Dukov's place. He lives here.

topics.topic: DukovWhoreAdmit it. You're just a whore.
topics.topic_text: So basically, you're just a whore?
topics.response_text: I'd rather be a whore than dead.

topics.topic: DukovYourChoiceI guess you'll just have to live with your choice.

topics.response_text: Here's the key. He never even noticed.

topics.topic_text: Dukov has a key I need. Steal it for me.
topics.response_text: How can I resist those...what color are your eyes anyway?

conversation.response_text: Ooh! Dukey, is that a rocket in your pocket, or are you just glad to feel me?
Sure. It's my turn anyway. Not that he remembers, or cares.
Dukey! You are so naughty. Later tonight I'll do something special for you.
It's where Dukov wants to live. It's his money. If you don't like it, leave.
